title: 1905 New York Giants JT Dye Postcard with Mathewson

posts.post_title: 1905 New York Giants JT Dye Postcard with Mathewson
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING

1905 New York Giants J.T. Dye postcard. B/W variation. Scorecard front featuring Mathewson, McGinnity, and others. Postally used (postmark looks to be 1907). 

Good condition.

$105 shipped. Paypal f/f or check.

PM or email with interest.

Email: semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

Thanks,
Ray
